bornIn: New York City, New York, USA
name: Al Pacino
bio: Alfredo James "Al" Pacino (born April 25, 1940) is an American film and stage actor and director.  He is famous for playing mobsters, including Michael Corleone in The Godfather trilogy, Tony Montana in Scarface, Alphonse "Big Boy" Caprice in Dick Tracy and Carlito Brigante in Carlito's Way, though he has also appeared several times on the other side of the law â€” as a police officer, detective and a lawyer...
